title: Infinite Dolls
description: Born to be the best.Head of his class.No strings attached.The third year of medical school is supposed to be the hardest, but Callum Trovatto has no idea what he's about to face when Everly Anne Brighton stands between him and a passing grade, shaking up his world with her secrets, and digging into his dark past.Hopeless.Trapped by her father's rules.Longing for freedom.Expected to die before her twenty-first birthday, at the hands of a rare medical condition, Everly Brighton begins to defy the carefully crafted routine her father enforces to keep her alive, despite the fact that it could kill her.INFINITE DOLLS is an emotionally charged love story about finding faith, coping with loss, and living in the preciousness of Now.
author: Emalynne Wilder
